Package ohos.agp.components

Class SlideDrawer

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.agp.components.Component
      • ohos.agp.components.ComponentContainer
        • ohos.agp.components.SlideDrawer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ComponentParent

    public class SlideDrawer
extends ComponentContainer
    Provides a SlideDrawer item.

    This class allows for the display of the main component while hiding the set of its four optional components related to different directions (start, top, end, and bottom). To show an optional component, the end user needs to slide from the corresponding direction.

    Since:
    5

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  SlideDrawer.DisplayMode
      Enumerates the modes for the optional components to display.
      static class  SlideDrawer.DrawerState
      Enumerates the possible states for SlideDrawer.
      static class  SlideDrawer.LayoutConfig
      Configures layout parameters of SlideDrawer, including the width, height, margin, SlideDirection, and DisplayMode.
      static class  SlideDrawer.SlideDirection
      Enumerates the directions of the optional components relative to the main component.
      static interface  SlideDrawer.SlideDisable
      Allows for disabling slides in real time.
      static interface  SlideDrawer.SlideListener
      Listens for SlideDrawer state changes.

      • setOpenThreshold

        public void setOpenThreshold​(float percent)
        Sets the percent value after which the optional component can be slid open.

        The default percent value is DEFAULT_OPEN_THRESHOLD.

        Parameters:
        percent - Indicates the percent value.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Throws this exception if the percent value is less than 0.0f or more than 1.0f.
        Since:
        5
        See Also:
        getOpenThreshold()

        public SlideDrawer.DrawerState getSlideState​()
        Obtains the current SlideDrawer state. The state value can be DrawerState#OPEN, DrawerState#MIDDLE, or DrawerState#CLOSE.

      • getSlideDirection

        public SlideDrawer.SlideDirection getSlideDirection​()
        Obtains the current SlideDrawer direction. The value can be SlideDirection#START, SlideDirection#TOP, SlideDirection#END, or SlideDirection#BOTTOM. The returned value will be null if the current SlideDrawer state isn't DrawerState#OPEN.
        Returns:
        Returns the current SlideDirection or null.
        Since:
        5

      • setDisplayMode

        public void setDisplayMode​(SlideDrawer.DisplayMode mode)
        Sets a display mode for all the optional components. The mode can be DisplayMode#NO_ANIMATION or DisplayMode#WITH_ANIMATION.

        The default mode is DEFAULT_DISPLAY_MODE.

        You can use the setDisplayMode(ohos.agp.components.SlideDrawer.DisplayMode,ohos.agp.components.SlideDrawer.SlideDirection) method if you wish to set the display mode only for a specified direction.

        You can use the setDisplayMode(ohos.agp.components.SlideDrawer.DisplayMode,ohos.agp.components.SlideDrawer.DisplayMode,ohos.agp.components.SlideDrawer.DisplayMode,ohos.agp.components.SlideDrawer.DisplayMode) method to set different values for all four directions in one call.

        It is not recommended to use DisplayMode#NO_ANIMATION and padding together.

        Parameters:
        mode - Indicates the display mode.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Throws this exception if the mode value is null.
        Since:
        5
        See Also:
        setDisplayMode(DisplayMode, SlideDirection), setDisplayMode(DisplayMode, DisplayMode, DisplayMode, DisplayMode), getDisplayMode(SlideDirection), getDisplayMode(), SlideDrawer.DisplayMode

      • setDisplayMode

        public void setDisplayMode​(SlideDrawer.DisplayMode mode,
                           SlideDrawer.SlideDirection direction)
        Sets the display mode for the optional components from a certain direction. The mode can be DisplayMode#NO_ANIMATION or DisplayMode#WITH_ANIMATION.

        The default mode is DEFAULT_DISPLAY_MODE.

        You can use the setDisplayMode(ohos.agp.components.SlideDrawer.DisplayMode,ohos.agp.components.SlideDrawer.DisplayMode,ohos.agp.components.SlideDrawer.DisplayMode,ohos.agp.components.SlideDrawer.DisplayMode) method to set different values for all four directions in one call.

        You can use the setDisplayMode(ohos.agp.components.SlideDrawer.DisplayMode) method to set a specified display mode for all directions.

        It is not recommended to use DisplayMode#NO_ANIMATION and padding together.

        Parameters:
        mode - Indicates the display mode.
        direction - Indicates the direction.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Throws this exception if the direction or mode value is null.
        Since:
        5
        See Also:
        setDisplayMode(DisplayMode), setDisplayMode(DisplayMode, DisplayMode, DisplayMode, DisplayMode), getDisplayMode(SlideDirection), getDisplayMode(), SlideDrawer.DisplayMode, SlideDrawer.SlideDirection

      • setDisplayMode

        public void setDisplayMode​(SlideDrawer.DisplayMode startMode,
                           SlideDrawer.DisplayMode topMode,
                           SlideDrawer.DisplayMode endMode,
                           SlideDrawer.DisplayMode bottomMode)
        Sets different display modes for all directions. The mode can be DisplayMode#NO_ANIMATION or DisplayMode#WITH_ANIMATION.

        The default mode is DEFAULT_DISPLAY_MODE.

        You can use the setDisplayMode(ohos.agp.components.SlideDrawer.DisplayMode,ohos.agp.components.SlideDrawer.SlideDirection) method if you wish to set the display mode only for a specified direction.

        You can use the setDisplayMode(ohos.agp.components.SlideDrawer.DisplayMode) method to set a specified display mode for all directions.

        It is not recommended to use DisplayMode#NO_ANIMATION and padding together.

        Parameters:
        startMode - Indicates the display mode related to the SlideDirection#START direction.
        topMode - Indicates the display mode related to the SlideDirection#TOP direction.
        endMode - Indicates the display mode related to the SlideDirection#END direction.
        bottomMode - Indicates the display mode related to the SlideDirection#BOTTOM direction.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Throws this exception if any of the modes is null.
        Since:
        5
        See Also:
        setDisplayMode(DisplayMode), setDisplayMode(DisplayMode, SlideDirection), getDisplayMode(SlideDirection), getDisplayMode(), Component.LayoutDirection

      • getDisplayMode

        public SlideDrawer.DisplayMode getDisplayMode​(SlideDrawer.SlideDirection direction)
        Obtains the display mode for the optional components for a certain direction.

        The default mode is DEFAULT_DISPLAY_MODE.

        You can use the getDisplayMode() method to obtain the display modes for all the directions in one call.

        Parameters:
        direction - Indicates the direction.
        Returns:
        Returns the display mode.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Throws this exception if the direction value is null.
        Since:
        5
        See Also:
        setDisplayMode(DisplayMode), setDisplayMode(DisplayMode, SlideDirection), setDisplayMode(DisplayMode, DisplayMode, DisplayMode, DisplayMode), getDisplayMode(), SlideDrawer.SlideDirection

      • getDisplayMode

        public SlideDrawer.DisplayMode[] getDisplayMode​()
        Obtains the display modes for the optional components for all directions.

        The default mode is DEFAULT_DISPLAY_MODE.

        You can use the getDisplayMode(ohos.agp.components.SlideDrawer.SlideDirection) method to obtain the display mode for a certain direction.

        Returns:
        Returns an array of the modes, where: first element (index 0) - the mode of the SlideDirection#START direction; second element (index 1) - the mode of the SlideDirection#TOP direction; third element (index 2) - the mode of the SlideDirection#BOTTOM direction; fourth element (index 3) - the mode of the SlideDirection#END direction.
        Since:
        5
        See Also:
        setDisplayMode(DisplayMode, SlideDirection), setDisplayMode(DisplayMode), setDisplayMode(DisplayMode, DisplayMode, DisplayMode, DisplayMode), getDisplayMode(SlideDirection)

      • open

        public boolean open​()
        Opens the SlideDrawer if SlideDrawer contains the optional component only for the single direction).
        Returns:
        Returns true if the operation is successful; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        5
        See Also:
        close(), toggle(), openSmoothly(), open(SlideDirection)

      • open

        public boolean open​(SlideDrawer.SlideDirection direction)
        Opens the SlideDrawer in a certain direction if its current state is DrawerState#CLOSE. You can pass null for direction to open the SlideDrawer if it contains optional components that can be displayed with a slide only from one direction.
        Parameters:
        direction - Indicates the direction, which can be set to null.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the operation is successful; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        5
        See Also:

      • close

        public boolean close​(SlideDrawer.SlideDirection direction)
        Closes the SlideDrawer in a certain direction if its current state is DrawerState#OPEN and the direction parameter equals the value returned by getSlideDirection(). You can pass null for direction to close the SlideDrawer anyway.
        Parameters:
        direction - Indicates the direction, which can be set to null.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the operation is successful; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        5
        See Also:
        open(SlideDirection), toggle(SlideDirection), closeSmoothly(SlideDirection), close(), SlideDrawer.SlideDirection
